ygData.subject: Re: Sweet Revenge was Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh yes, one of the finer things about this game  revenge! Last night - our little group (13 & 2 14 s) took down the scarecrows in west karana
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh yes, one of the finer things about this game <eg> revenge!

Last night - our little group (13 & 2 14's) took down the scarecrows in west
karana <muhahha> It was great to hit on red cons and win! Good xp too!
These seemed easy even as we took them one at a time - would not like 2 or 3
at once though.

But they used to terrorize us and now we whine that they are not tuff enough
<s>

Sylly
Bard of the 13th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out in Qeynos on Innoruuk

p.s. I kill Fippy every time I see him regardless!

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 5:02 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Greetings

From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<Michael.Garramone@...>
i died getting the lute around level 40 or so and
haven't gone back since. in fact i've been to mistmoore 3
times and died 3
times. hmmm now i think it may be time for revenge.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
